description: Promoting Climate Change Adaptation, Energy & Environment. Strengthened regional capacities to adapt to climate change and increase the use of renewable energy sources.

subproject.description: This strategic initiative aims to assist countries in preparing Low Emission Climate Resilient Development Strategies and to raise awareness throughout developing capacity building, guidance to national policy makers, investment and financial flows assessment processes to national policies towards the post-2012 climate change regime.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: POST KYOTO

subproject.description: This initiative aims to strengthen the capacity of the private and public sectors in several countries of Latin America and the Caribbean to understand and develop projects in the areas of carbon finance, renewable energy, energy efficiency, and maintain a CDM project pipeline.

subproject.description: This project aims to develop capacity building for territorial approach to address climate change through targeted multi sectorial advocacy, planning and management pipeline at national and subnational level, to facilitate the integration of adaptation into regional  and national development policies and strategies.
